title: Manage Demurrage Charges
description: A container has been left at a port terminal beyond its allotted free time, incurring demurrage fees. An agent must resolve this.

tasks.description: Receive an alert from the ocean carrier that a container is accruing demurrage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is notified of the charge.

tasks.description: Identify the reason for the delay in picking up the container (e.g., customs hold, no truck capacity).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the delay was due to a customs inspection.

tasks.description: Arrange for a trucking company to pick up the container immediately to stop further charges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully dispatches a truck to retrieve the container.

tasks.description: Approve the demurrage invoice for payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The invoice for the accrued fees is approved.
